events.message: I reported the car accident that occurred on the highway yesterday. The vehicle sustained significant front-end damage.
The claim was classified under Auto Accident based on the details provided about the collision and vehicle damage.
An agent specializing in vehicle accident claims has been assigned to assist you through this process.
Your claim related to the car collision is officially acknowledged and is now being processed.
Please submit photos of the accident scene, the repair estimate, and the police report to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents have been submitted, including vehicle photos and the official police accident report.
The claim investigation commenced to verify the details of the accident and assess damage liability.
The investigation has concluded, confirming the accident details matched your report and the vehicle damage assessment.
We have proposed a settlement amount covering the repair costs and deductible based on the investigation findings.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the prompt handling of your auto claim and the proposed settlement.
The claim was approved based on the agreement of the settlement terms and supporting documentation.
Payment has been issued to your repair shop to cover the insured amount for the vehicle damages.
The auto accident claim is now closed following successful payment and completion of all claim processes.
Your auto accident claim files have been securely archived for record-keeping and future reference.
